def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(a)
    print(a[0])
    print(a[0:2])
    print(a[:2])
    print(a[1:])
    print(a[:-1])
    print(a[-1])
    print(a[::2])
    print(a[::-1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n, k = map(int, input().split())
t = input()

ans = ""
for i in range(n):
    if i < (k - 1) % n:
        ans += t[i]
    else:
        ans += t[(k - 1) % n]

print(ans)

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    print(t * (k // n) + t[:k % n])


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n, k = map(int, input().split())
t = input()

ans = t[(k - 1) % n] * n

print(ans)


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    print(t*(k//n) + t[:k%n])


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
